content: @Alex Keizer If it is not too much work, it would be great to have a #mwe. It would help us to investigate whether we can improve the system to avoid the counterintuitive behavior you have experienced.

It's kind of hard to distill an mwe, since the posted code depends on quite a lot of other code in the project.
My attempts to create a similar situation have all been correctly handled by cases, I'm not entirely sure what triggered the weird errors in my case.

For now a simple solution might be to point users to the match tactic if cases fails for weird reasons, so that the former's more detailed errors can point to the solution
Alex Keizer has marked this topic as resolved.
